trans-unit.source: Defines a style for speaking prompts that consists of settings for emphasis, rate, and volume.
trans-unit.target: 定义包含强调、 速率和卷的设置语速提示的样式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptStyle"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptStyle"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptStyle"></xref> class and specifies the setting for the emphasis of the style.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptStyle"></xref>类并指定样式的强调的设置。

trans-unit.source: The speech synthesis engines in Windows do not support variations in the emphasis of speech output at this time.
trans-unit.target: Windows 中的语音合成引擎不支持变体中的语音输出的强调这次。

trans-unit.source: Setting values for emphasis using a member of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptEmphasis> enumeration will produce no audible change in the synthesized speech output.
trans-unit.target: 设置使用的成员的强调的值<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptEmphasis>枚举将生成合成的语音输出中没有声音更改。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptEmphasis>

trans-unit.source: The setting for the emphasis of the style.
trans-unit.target: 设置样式的强调。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptStyle"></xref> class and specifies the setting for the speaking rate of the style.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptStyle"></xref>类并指定样式的语速的设置。

trans-unit.source: The setting for the speaking rate of the style.
trans-unit.target: 样式的语速设置。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptStyle"></xref> class and specifies the setting for the speaking volume of the style.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptStyle"></xref>类并指定样式的朗读音量的设置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptVolume> setting for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptVolume> is full volume, which is the same as <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptVolume>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptVolume><xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptVolume>是完整的卷，即<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptVolume>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptVolume>相同</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptVolume>的设置</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptVolume>

trans-unit.source: The other settings decrease the volume of speech output relative to full volume.
trans-unit.target: 其他设置降低语音输出相对于完整的卷的卷。

trans-unit.source: The setting for the volume (loudness) of the style.
trans-unit.target: 该设置的卷 （响度） 的样式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the setting for the emphasis of the style.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置样式的强调的设置。

trans-unit.source: The speech synthesis engines in Windows do not support variations in the emphasis of speech output at this time.
trans-unit.target: Windows 中的语音合成引擎不支持变体中的语音输出的强调这次。

trans-unit.source: Setting values for emphasis using a member of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptEmphasis> enumeration will produce no audible change in the synthesized speech output.
trans-unit.target: 设置使用的成员的强调的值<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptEmphasis>枚举将生成合成的语音输出中没有声音更改。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptEmphasis>

trans-unit.source: Returns the setting for the emphasis of the style.
trans-unit.target: 返回样式的强调的设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the setting for the speaking rate of the style.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置样式的语速的设置。

trans-unit.source: Returns the setting for the speaking rate of the style.
trans-unit.target: 返回样式的语速的设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the setting for the volume (loudness) of the style.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的卷 （响度） 的样式设置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptVolume> setting for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptVolume> is full volume, which is the same as <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptVolume>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptVolume><xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptVolume>是完整的卷，即<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptVolume>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptVolume>相同</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptVolume>的设置</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptVolume>

trans-unit.source: The other settings decrease the volume of speech output relative to full volume.
trans-unit.target: 其他设置降低语音输出相对于完整的卷的卷。

trans-unit.source: Returns the setting for the volume (loudness) of the style.
trans-unit.target: 返回的卷 （响度） 的样式设置。
